## High-level description
This file defines feature flags and their configurations for a "production" namespace. It uses YAML format to store key-value pairs for each feature.

## Code Structure
This file does not contain code. It is a YAML file used for configuration.

## Symbols
This file does not define any code symbols. It is a data file in YAML format.

## Dependencies
This file does not have any dependencies.

## Configuration
This file defines feature flags and their values for the "production" namespace. The specific features and their values are not included in the provided snippet. 

## Error Handling
N/A - This is a data file and does not contain any error handling logic.

## Logging
N/A - This is a data file and does not contain any logging mechanisms.

## API/Interface Reference
N/A - This is a data file and does not expose any API or interface.
